name: RainbowShip 4
description:
Play in fullscreen for best experience.

Keys:

ESC to release the mouse lock
Arrow key (or wsad) Controls the ship
Space (or enter) Shoot

Desc:
Shoot your way through waves of enemies in your rainbowship.

If you want a windows, mac or linux version of the game
Put it in the comments and i'll add it to the download
